EmailTemplate.name: Executive Dinner EMEA 2_25_16.Confirmation Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}'s Pass to Executive Dinner London | February 25, 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank You For Registering To Join Our VMTurbo Executive Dinner Percy & Founders | February 18 at 7:00 p.m. <[[http://vmturbo.com/executive-dinner-london]]> {{Lead.First Name:default=}}, Thank you for registering to attend our Executive Dinner with VMTurbo Founder, Shmuel Kliger. This email confirms your spot to attend this exclusive event at Percy & Founders.
{{Lead.First Name:default=}} {{Lead.Last Name:default=}} {{company.Company Name:default=}} Executive Dinner London Thursday, February 25, 2016 7:00 PM Percy & Founders, 1 Pearson Square, London W1T 3BF If you have any questions, please contact marketing@vmturbo.com <[[mailto:marketing@vmturbo.com]]>.
- The VMTurbo Team
